description: This file defines a React functional component 'Discover' used for displaying a list of videos fetched from an API, including loading and error handling, image imports, and rendering video cards with links to details pages.

methods.name: Discover()
methods.description: React component that fetches and displays a grid of video items with loading and error states.

methods.name: fetchVideos
methods.description: Async function to fetch video data from external API and handle loading/error states.

methods.name: pickPreviewImage
methods.description: Function that selects a preview image for a video based on its index.
